topic.title: Bitcoin classic binaries are released.
topic.body:
Located at: https://github.com/bitcoinclassic/bitcoinclassic/releases/tag/v0.11.2.cl1.b2

This client will support the 2MB block size limit.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [nippletwister](#comment_44_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf): I think it works...

thx for info :D
